summary: THE DRIVER SIDE AIR BAG INFLATOR LIGHT FLASHED AND TOOK IT TO THE DEALERSHIP TO GET THAT RECALL FIXED AND WAS TOLD THAT THE CLOCK SPRING WAS THE DEFECT WHICH MADE THE AIR BAG LIGHT COME ON WHICH THE AIR BAG WAS DEFECTED AND THE HORN DID NOT WORK.  WHAT STARTED OUT AS A FREE SERVICE TURNED INTO A COST OF $311 WHICH I DID NOT HAVE.  IF THE AIR BAG INFLATOR LIGHT COMES ON BECAUSE OF THE DEFECTED CLOCK SPRING THEN WHY ISNT THE CLOCK SPRING THE RECALL ITEM.  SEEMS TO ME THAT INORDER FOR IT ALL TO WORK IT IS THE CLOCK SPRING THAT NEEDS THE RECALL.
